quizQ.question: How did Daenerys Targaryen eventually hatch her dragon eggs?

quizQ.option_a: Valar Rohnas or 'all men must live'
quizQ.option_b: Valar Dohaeris or 'all men must serve'
quizQ.option_c: Valar GoGo or 'all men must dance'
